text: well still relatively few details but
what we know is that this was an attack
about seven o'clock in the morning local
time in a general Intelligence Agency
office just in this Palestinian refugee
camp it's the largest one in Jordan
bokar camp which is just to the north of
the capital a place that suffers from
chronic unemployment and poverty where
there is concern about Islamic extremism
the office would have been relatively
quiet because it's the first day of the
Islamic holy month of Ramadan a time
when Muslims fast observant Muslims from
dawn until dusk and the government
officers have mostly in the Arab
countries have put back their opening
times ten o'clock something like that
we know from Mohammed Al Mamoni who's
the Jordanian government spokesman that
there were five intelligence personnel
killed among them a guard and also a
telephone exchange operator and he said
that terrorists were responsible he
suggested the assailants were Islamic
militants saying that they showed the
criminal behavior of people who are
outside of our religion
